comment.author: 29079609@N02
comment._content: 3/37/13, perhaps spring training? Major League Baseball catcher with the Detroit Tigers from 1913-1916. Born in Shawnee, Ohio, McKee was drafted by the New York Highlanders from Indianapolis of the American Association. Two days later, the Highlanders traded McKee to the Tigers for Claud Derrick. From 1913-1916, McKee played in 189 games for the Tigers, 150 as a catcher and the rest as a pinch hitter. en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Red_McKee
